alert.note: Alert for Cortland; Onondaga; Southern Cayuga; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 2:53PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Cayuga, northern Cortland, south central Onondaga and northeastern Tompkins Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 252 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Taughannock Falls, or near Ithaca, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cortland, Cayuga Heights, Lansing, Homer, Otisco, Groton, Locke, Genoa, Preble and Moravia. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 10 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Boaters on the Finger Lakes in the path of this storm should get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
